page.title: 04RECREATION SOCIAL LIFE 1985
page.content: Kibworth Beauchamp in socially very active. The wide variety of hobbies and interests pursued by the inhabitant is shown in the many clubs and sporting groups. The sports of golf, tennis and cricket each have their own clubs, each with its own premises. A badminton club meets at Kibworth High School which also provides facilities for drama, dance and a variety of other interests. The village also supports Kibworth Band, a silver band well known throughout the county. Kibworth Trust is a recently formed organisation concerned with the preservation and improvement of the village environment. Childrens interests are also provided for with Scouting and Guiding as well as school and church based groups.
